item.title: Harper & Associates, Rochester, NY
item.dc:creator: roberto1122
item.content:encoded:


About

Harper & Associates, Rochester NY: Your go-to legal experts for a range of legal services. We’re committed to delivering justice and unparalleled client service in Rochester.

Lawyer Rating:

  • Legal Knowledge 100% 100%
  • Legal Analysis 95% 95%
  • Communication 95% 95%
  • Professionalism 100% 100%

Our Score:



/5

Outstanding!



Law Firm Information

Harper & Associates, based in Rochester, NY, is a law firm that prides itself on its ability to handle a diverse range of legal matters with efficiency and professionalism. Our team of experienced attorneys brings a wealth of knowledge and expertise to each case, ensuring our clients receive the highest standard of legal service. We understand that facing legal issues can be challenging, and we’re here to provide clear guidance and robust representation. Our commitment extends beyond the courtroom, as we strive to be active members of the Rochester community, contributing to its growth and well-being.


Practice Areas

– Family Law: Divorce Proceedings, Child Custody Battles, Alimony, Adoption, Domestic Violence Cases.

– Criminal Law: DUI/DWI Charges, Drug Offenses, Assault Cases, Theft and Fraud, White-Collar Crime.

– Corporate Law: Business Formation, Mergers and Acquisitions, Corporate Governance, Intellectual Property Disputes, Contract Drafting and Negotiation.

– Tax Law: Tax Dispute Resolution, IRS Audits, Tax Planning for Businesses, Estate Tax Issues, Tax Fraud Defense.

– Bankruptcy Law: Chapter 7 and Chapter 13 Bankruptcy, Debt Restructuring, Creditors’ Rights, Business Insolvency.



Legal Challenges We Can Help with

Divorce, Child Custody Disputes, DUI/DWI Defense, Drug Possession Charges, White-Collar Criminal Defense, Business Formation and Dissolution, Intellectual Property Rights, IRS Audit Representation, Chapter 7 Bankruptcy Filing, Debt Collection Lawsuits, Estate Planning, Property Division in Divorce, Adoption Legalities, Alimony and Spousal Support, Employment Discrimination Cases, Corporate Litigation, Tax Evasion Defense, Fraudulent Transactions, Real Estate Disputes, Landlord-Tenant Conflicts.


Fees

– Free Consultation – Credit Card Accepted


Languages

– English
– Spanish



Key Team

– Elizabeth Martinez, Founding Partner: Expert in estate planning with 25 years of experience, providing compassionate and detailed guidance.

– James Lee, Litigation Attorney: A strong presence in the courtroom with 15 years in commercial litigation, known for his strategic and assertive approach.

– Anna Chen, Immigration Lawyer: With 10 years of experience, Anna specializes in complex immigration cases, offering hope and solutions to her clients.



Awards

– “Best Law Firm in Brooklyn” – Brooklyn Legal Awards 2023

– “Top 10 Criminal Defense Attorneys” – NY Legal Circle 2022

– “Community Service Award” – Brooklyn Bar Association



item.title: David Smith – Corporate Attorney
item.dc:creator: roberto1122
item.content:encoded:


About

David Smith, a leading attorney at Smith & Associates in New York, NY. With over 20 years of experience, he is renowned for his strategic approach and dedication to client success.

Lawyer Rating:

  • Legal Knowledge 100% 100%
  • Legal Analysis 95% 95%
  • Communication 95% 95%
  • Professionalism 100% 100%

Our Score:



/5

Outstanding!



Biography

David Smith stands as a distinguished attorney and senior partner at Smith & Associates, renowned for his expertise in corporate law and his unwavering commitment to client advocacy. With over 20 years of experience, David has become a respected figure in the legal community, known for his strategic approach and profound understanding of complex legal landscapes.

After graduating with honors from Harvard Law School, David embarked on his legal career, quickly establishing himself as a formidable force in corporate litigation. His prowess in navigating intricate legal issues has led to numerous high-profile victories, earning him a reputation as a trusted advisor in the corporate sector.

David’s areas of specialization include mergers and acquisitions, corporate governance, and intellectual property law. His keen insight into business law has been instrumental in guiding corporations through significant transitions and legal challenges. David’s approach is not just about providing legal solutions but also about understanding the business objectives of his clients, ensuring that legal strategies align with their broader goals.

Apart from his legal practice, David is a passionate advocate for continuing legal education. He frequently lectures at law schools and legal symposiums, sharing his knowledge and experiences with the next generation of lawyers. He has also authored several articles on corporate law, contributing to esteemed legal journals.

In recognition of his contributions to the legal field, David has received numerous awards and accolades. He has been consistently ranked among the top corporate lawyers by various legal directories and has been featured in national publications for his expert opinions on high-stakes legal matters.

At Smith & Associates, David leads a team of dedicated professionals, fostering an environment of excellence and integrity. His leadership style is characterized by mentorship and collaboration, inspiring his team to strive for the highest standards in legal service.

David is deeply committed to his community, serving on the board of several non-profit organizations. He believes in using his legal expertise to make a positive impact, advocating for social justice and community development.

As a seasoned attorney with a rich career marked by success and leadership, David Smith continues to be a driving force in the legal industry, setting benchmarks for excellence and professionalism.



Practice Areas

– Corporate Law: Mergers and Acquisitions, Corporate Governance, Intellectual Property Management, Commercial Contracts, Corporate Restructuring.

– Business Law: Business Formation, Employment Law, Venture Capital, Regulatory Compliance, Risk Management.

– Intellectual Property Law: Trademark and Patent Prosecution, Licensing Agreements, IP Litigation, Trade Secret Protection, Copyright Law.

– Commercial Litigation: Contract Disputes, Business Torts, Shareholder Disagreements, Antitrust Law, Securities Litigation.

– International Business Transactions: Cross-Border M&A, Trade Agreements, Foreign Investment, International Law Compliance, Export Controls.



Fees

– Free Consultation
– Credit Card Accepted


Languages

– English: Spoken, Written
– Spanish: Spoken, Written



Professional Experience

– Senior Partner, Smith & Associates: Leading Corporate Law Division, Strategic Client Consultation, Team Management, High-Profile Case Leadership.

– Corporate Litigation Attorney, Global Law Firm: Complex Litigation Management, Multinational Client Representation, Legal Strategy Development.

– Associate Attorney, Business Law Group: M&A Negotiation and Execution, Contract Drafting and Review, Client Advising on Business Legal Matters.

– Legal Clerk, Federal Court: Judicial Support, Legal Research, Case Brief Preparation, Courtroom Procedure Assistance.

– Legal Intern, IP Law Firm: Intellectual Property Case Assistance, Patent and Trademark Research, Document Drafting and Organization.



Education

– J.D., Harvard Law School: Specialization in Corporate Law, Magna Cum Laude, Harvard Law Review Editor.

– B.A. in Political Science, Stanford University: Honors Program, Focus on International Relations and Economics.

– Study Abroad Program, University of Oxford: Concentration in International Law and Global Governance.

– Continuing Legal Education: Ongoing courses in Intellectual Property, Business Ethics, and International Business Law.



Awards

– “Top Corporate Lawyer of the Year”, National Legal Excellence Awards: Recognized for outstanding achievements in corporate law and significant contributions to the legal community.



item.title: Ray Phillips – Family Lawyer NYC
item.dc:creator: roberto1122
item.content:encoded:


About

Renowned for his empathetic approach and commitment to achieving the best outcomes for families, Ray specializes in divorce, custody, and mediation matters.

Lawyer Rating:

  • Legal Knowledge 100% 100%
  • Legal Analysis 95% 95%
  • Communication 95% 95%
  • Professionalism 100% 100%

Our Score:



/5

Outstanding!



Biography

Ray Phillips has dedicated his 18-year career to the practice of family law in New York, developing a reputation as a compassionate and skilled family lawyer. His practice centers on helping families navigate the often complex and emotional landscape of family law disputes. Graduating from NYU School of Law, Ray began his career with a deep-seated commitment to family advocacy. He has since become a trusted name in family law, known for his ability to handle sensitive cases involving divorce, child custody, and family mediation with care and discretion. Ray’s approach to family law is rooted in understanding and empathy. He recognizes the emotional strain these cases can place on individuals and families and strives to provide legal solutions that prioritize the well-being of all parties involved. This client-centered focus has led to many successful resolutions, both in and out of court. In addition to his legal practice, Ray is an active member of various family law committees and frequently volunteers at community legal clinics. He is committed to raising awareness about family law issues and providing accessible legal support to those in need.


Practice Areas

– Family Law: Divorce and Separation, Child Custody and Visitation, Spousal and Child Support, Mediation and Conflict Resolution, Prenuptial Agreements.



Fees

– Free Consultation – Credit Card Accepted


Languages

– English: Spoken, Written
– Spanish: Spoken, Written



Professional Experience

– Family Law Attorney, Phillips Family Law Firm: Lead Attorney in Family Law Cases, Mediation and Settlement Negotiation.

– Legal Counsel, Children’s Rights Organization: Advocacy for Children’s Legal Rights, Policy Development.

– Associate Attorney, General Practice Firm: Family Law Focus, Client Representation in Court, Legal Documentation.



Education

– J.D., NYU School of Law: Specialization in Family Law.

– B.A. in Psychology, Columbia University: With Honors, Focus on Developmental Psychology.



Awards

– “Top Lawyer of the Year”, National Legal Excellence Awards: Recognized for outstanding achievements in corporate law and significant contributions to the legal community.



Law Firm Information

Greenwood Legal Group, nestled in Manhattan’s bustling legal hub, has become synonymous with legal excellence and client satisfaction in New York. Our firm’s ethos is rooted in a deep commitment to providing strategic, customized legal solutions. With a team of seasoned attorneys, we cover a broad spectrum of legal fields, offering our clients the combined expertise of years of successful practice. Greenwood Legal Group is more than a law firm; we are a trusted partner in our clients’ legal journeys. Our approach goes beyond traditional legal representation; we strive to be counselors, strategists, and advocates, ensuring our clients’ needs are met with the highest standards of professionalism and ethical conduct.

– Corporate Law: Mergers & Acquisitions, Corporate Governance, Securities Regulation.

– Litigation: Civil Litigation, Commercial Disputes, Arbitration.
